title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
Smarter Contact is a rapidly growing SaaS company at the forefront of revolutionizing customer engagement. Our cutting-edge platform empowers businesses to connect with their customers in meaningful ways, utilizing the latest technologies to enhance communication, streamline processes, and drive overall customer satisfaction.

As we are growing our market presence we are looking for a full stack engineer to take ownership of the end-to-end development process, ensuring the delivery of high-quality, scalable, and maintainable software solutions.

Qualifications:

  • 7+ years of proven experience as a Senior Dev within a SaaS or technology-driven company.
  • Strong background in software development, architecture, and technology strategy.
  • Demonstrated success in leading and scaling technology teams in a fast-paced, high-growth environment.
  • In-depth knowledge of current and emerging technologies, with a focus on SaaS and cloud-based solutions.
  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

Technical Requirements

  • Proficient in NodeJS for server-side development.
  • Extensive experience in building user interfaces with ReactJS and Typescript
  • Strong expertise in Google Cloud Platform (GCP), including but not limited to Compute Engine, Cloud Functions, Cloud Storage, and Cloud SQL.
  • In-depth knowledge of Postgres database management, including database design, optimization, and maintenance.
  • Preferred background with C# or Onion Architecture
  • Proven experience implementing and applying DDD principles and CQRS patterns in the development of scalable and maintainable systems.
  • Architectural proficiency in designing and implementing scalable, distributed systems.
  • Ability to define and implement microservices architectures for complex applications.
  • Experience working in Agile development environments, with a deep understanding of Agile methodologies and practices.

Nice to Have

  • Prior experience in the messaging space
  • Worked for a fast moving startup


We are looking for the BEST that want to be part of a fast growing company that is set to take off. If you meet ALL of the qualifications, we can't wait to hear from you.

Overall Objective:

We are currently looking for a pool of communication consultants for FWCs, supporting the EIB in the delivery of communication campaigns and activities in various countries or regions outside the EU. Such activities will contribute to raising EU and EIB visibility and increasing awareness of the positive impact of the projects supported by the EU and the EIB with the largest possible audience in those countries or regions.


The communication consultants will be supporting the implementation of the Assignment in the relevant country or region, including coordination with all stakeholders and management of any subcontractors or service providers. They are expected to have professional experience in implementing communication campaigns in the relevant country or region as well as the necessary language skills.


Tasks:

  • Development and validation of a detailed, costed implementation plan
  • Establishment of working process and contact protocol among the local team and project stakeholders for the implementation of the campaign
  • Timely implementation of the communication campaign
  • Planning, organisation and management of press conferences and/or events and/or focus groups and/or workshops
  • Coordination with all stakeholders, including organisation of regular coordination meetings, as required
  • Media outreach
  • Negotiating and/or buying traditional or digital media advertising space
  • Monitoring, evaluating and reporting on communication activities
  • Establishment and management of partnerships, e.G. with NGOs or influencers


Qualifications and skills:

  • University degree in journalism, communication, social science or an academic equivalent;
  • Fluency in English, including the ability for clear and concise oral and written expression;
  • Fluency in the main language spoken in the country of the assignment


Professional experience:

  • 8 years of professional experience in communication services, including 5 years in the country of the assignment;
  • 4 years of experience in developing and implementing communication campaigns, including production or quality control of video, audio, printed materials (media and multimedia products) and events;
  • Experience in the delivery of communication services for international organisations (EU, UN, IFIs) or public institutions in the country of the assignment.


Only selected candidates will be contacted.

title: Cs Specialist - Spanish & Portuguese
description:
Bitget are a top-tier digital assets exchange platform with over 50 countries' global footprints, and aim to be the portal that transcends Web2 and Web3, connects CeFi and DeFi, and bridges the vast web of crypto.

  • Top 1 platform for copy trading globally
  • Top 5 derivatives trading globally
  • 8+ million registered users
  • 1K+ employees in over 38 countries
  • Provide stable security of A+ ranking for 12 SSL indicators
  • Proof of Reserves - guarantees 100% of users' assets in reserves

About the Job

We are looking for a Customer Support Specialist (Spanish & Portuguese) to join our global support team. In this role, you will provide live chat and ticket support in both Spanish and Portuguese, assisting customers with account-related issues, cryptocurrency transactions, wallet management, and platform navigation. You will be part of a multilingual, fast-paced team, ensuring top-tier customer service and efficient issue resolution.

Job Responsibilities

  • Deliver real-time live chat and ticket support in Spanish, Portuguese, and English, providing a seamless customer experience.
  • Assist users with account verification, deposits, withdrawals, security concerns, and technical troubleshooting.
  • Stay informed on company policies, cryptocurrency trends, and industry regulations to provide accurate and relevant support.
  • Work closely with internal teams to escalate and resolve complex customer issues efficiently.
  • Document customer interactions, identify recurring issues, and suggest process improvements.
  • Ensure compliance with data protection and security policies when handling sensitive customer information.
  • Maintain high responsiveness and problem-solving efficiency in a 24/7 rotating shift environment, including night shifts, weekends, and holidays.

Job Requirements

  • Fluency in Spanish (C1/C2) and Portuguese (C1/C2) – Excellent written and spoken communication skills.
  • Good command of English (B2 or higher) – Ability to communicate effectively in an international team.
  • Customer Service Experience – Previous experience in live chat, ticket handling, or online support is preferred.
  • Technical Aptitude – Basic understanding of cryptocurrency and blockchain is an advantage but not required.
  • Problem-Solving Mindset – Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills to assist users efficiently.
  • Team Collaboration – Ability to work in a multicultural, multilingual customer support team.
  • Flexibility & Adaptability – Willing to work in rotational shifts, including nights, weekends, and public holidays.
  • Risk & Security Awareness – Strong understanding of data security and customer protection best practices.

Nice to have

  • Working knowledge of CRM tools, such as Sprinkler/Zendesk.
  • Familiar with crypto/finance-technology industry
  • Experience working with teams across offices and time zones.

Benefits & Perks

  • Competitive remuneration package (Basic Salary + Yearly Bonuses).
  • Quarterly Team Building
  • Medical, Health & Learning allowance
  • Career growth and promotion
  • Employee engagement, recognition and appreciation program.
  • Multinational working environment

title: Sap Data Migration Lead Consultant
description:
ABOUT US

Syniti is the enterprise data partner, empowering anyone who relies on data to make business-critical decisions by delivering data they can trust through a unique combination of intelligent software and experts who deeply understand the role of data in enterprise growth.


Trusted by the Fortune 2000, Syniti helps leading businesses reconfigure the role of enterprise data from afterthought to foundational first step;
enabling them to unlockvaluable insights that ignite growth, reduce risk, and expand their competitive advantage.


Syniti’s Data First philosophy and enterprise data management platform supports data migration, data quality, data replication, data matching, master data management, analytics, data governance, and data strategy in a single, unified solution.


As an innovative, global leader in Enterprise Data Management, the combination of our award-winning software platform and premier consultants creates a unique advantage for leading enterprises. Syniti is also a preferred data solution used by the world’s top system integrators. Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts with offices in 25 countries around the world, Syniti operates in all global regions and industry verticals, and maintains a 100% client success rate across thousands of complex data projects and initiatives.



The ROLE

We are recruiting talented and motivated individuals to join our team delivering data projects for clients across the globe. As a lead data migration consultant at Syniti, you will be responsible for managing a team of migration consultants on all aspects of data work for a process area/workstream. You will work closely with functional consultants and key customer resources, gathering requirements through workshops, building conversion objects, and driving your team’s value through all data project phases. You will be responsible for making sure that your team uses your data skills and the Syniti data management platform to assess and iterate through design, build, and deployment, ensuring that the highest customer value is derived from your assigned objects. As a lead member of a Syniti Data Migration team, you will execute against the best practices for successful business transformation and become skilled in the strongest platform to meet all of our customer’s needs.



WHAT YOU WILL DO

After an initial training period, a Lead Data Migration Consultant will be expected to:


  • Demonstrate a strong understanding of Syniti’s Data Migration methodology.
  • Demonstrate strong proficiency in Syniti’s tools, working to prescribed development standards.
  • Good understanding of business processes for one or more assigned functional area, and the ability to quickly learn about new areas.
  • Effectively manage a small team of data migration consultants, to meet assigned responsibilities against the overall project plan.
  • Demonstrate a strong knowledge of underlying technical data structures and definitions of assigned functional process area.
  • Develop data migration rules and reports in the Syniti’s tools as per supplied specification.
  • Evaluate and contribute to ongoing data migration design for assigned process area through data analysis, reporting and collaboration with on-site Syniti and client colleagues.
  • Create and maintain data load programs.
  • Maintain related documentation and clearly communicate status to Syniti Team Leadership and customer PMO.
  • Execution of end-to-end data loads and reconciliations.
  • Support and mentor junior colleagues.



WHAT IT TAKES

  • Degree level qualification in Computer Science (or other technology related field).
  • Experience in ETL / Data Migration / Data Quality / Data Analysis.
  • Experience managing resources to deliver a collective goal/responsibility.
  • Functional ERP experience.
  • Project experience across multiple ERP implementations.
  • Database experience - SQL Server, Oracle etc.
  • Customer facing skills.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Willingness to travel according to project requirements up to 100%.



WHAT WE OFFER

  • Autonomy and Trust:
     Trust that you are proficient at what you do. At Syniti, you will find a supportive environment and access to learning tools, with minimal micromanagement.
  • Growth Opportunities:
     We are growing rapidly, offering you the chance to grow with us, shape our journey, and share in our success story.
  • Collaborative Support:
     We value collaboration and support each other, ensuring you won't stand alone in your endeavors.
  • Diversity of Stories:
     Genuine interest in your unique story and journey. We celebrate individual achievements and want to hear everyone's story.
  • Recognition:
     We appreciate and celebrate individual achievements, acknowledging the contribution of each team member.
  • Open Organization:
     We embrace an open and inclusive culture, where hierarchies are minimized, and access is ensured across the board. Everyone is valued, and ideas are welcomed.

title: Digital Advertising - Ppc Specialist
description:
About this Role


Location:
Remote (Brazil)


United World Telecom (est. 1996) offers cloud communication solutions to help businesses around the world communicate with their customers. We have a global and diverse team and over 8,000 customers worldwide.


We’re growing our marketing team and are looking for a Digital Advertising - PPC Specialist with strong technical analytics skills to manage, run, and monitor ad campaigns. An ideal candidate must have proven experience in tracking and managing paid advertisement budgets, ensuring the best returns on the campaigns. They must reside in Brazil and work alongside the digital marketing team to create strategic PPC campaigns that drive performance and deliver results.


PPC Responsibilities


Manage and Optimize Campaigns


  • Manage, monitor, optimize, plan, and create PPC campaigns across channels such as Google Ads, Bing Ads, and social media.
  • Research and analyze data to identify the most effective keywords (add relevant keywords and negative keywords) and strategies for our PPC campaigns.
  • Conduct competitors analysis to identify new opportunities and improve our PPC campaigns.
  • Optimize bidding at keyword, placement, device, geographic, demographic, and other levels.
  • With the help of our in-house content team, write engaging and concise copy to modify ads to boost click-through rates and landing pages to boost conversion rates.


Conversion Tracking Implementation and Troubleshooting


  • Audit, implement, and maintain accurate conversion tracking across all paid campaigns (Google Ads, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.).
  • Set up custom conversion events and parameters to align with account goals and ensure accurate reporting.


Google Tag Manager Expertise


  • Build and manage GTM containers to deploy tags, triggers, and variables for tracking user interactions (e.G., form submissions, button clicks, scroll depth).
  • Debug and troubleshoot tag firing issues using tools like Google Tag Assistant and GTM preview/debug mode.
  • Optimize GTM setup for scalability and ensure proper data layer implementation.


GA4 Setup and Optimization


  • Configure GA4 properties, events, and goals in line with campaign KPIs.
  • Troubleshoot discrepancies between GA4, Google Ads, and other platforms to ensure consistent data reporting.
  • Implement enhanced measurement events and custom dimensions/metrics as needed.


Data Accuracy and Reporting


  • Conduct regular audits of conversion tracking, tags, and analytics accounts to ensure data integrity.
  • Resolve tracking issues (e.G., broken tags, missing events, attribution gaps) swiftly and effectively.


Collaboration and Communication


  • Work closely with developers to ensure accurate data layer implementation and troubleshoot complex tracking issues.
  • Provide actionable recommendations to improve the quality of conversion data and its alignment with business goals.


Monitoring & Reporting


  • Perform daily account monitoring and management of PPC campaigns:
    Review expensive under-performing keywords, ensure PPC campaign does not exceed weekly and monthly ad spend budget, and maintain Quality Score, impression share, and other important metrics.
  • Document and update processes and changes in the internal document server.
  • Send daily & weekly reports to the marketing team.


Requirements / Skills :


  • Proven experience as a PPC Specialist or similar role, with a solid understanding of PPC advertising principles and best practices across various platforms.
  • 5-10 years PPC experience in SaaS and telecom industries with B2B emphasis is preferred but not required.
  • Proven experience with Google Ads and Bing Ads;
    Facebook ads and LinkedIn ads experience would be an added bonus.
  • Advanced Proficiency in Google Tag Manager:
    Experience setting up and managing complex GTM implementations, including custom HTML/JavaScript tags and data layer dependencies.
  • Expertise in Google Analytics 4 (GA4):
    Proven track record of configuring GA4 properties, events, and reports for detailed campaign tracking and attribution analysis.
  • Strong Knowledge of Conversion Tracking:
    Hands-on experience implementing and troubleshooting tracking setups for platforms like Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads.
  • Debugging and Problem-Solving:
    Familiarity with debugging tools such as Google Tag Assistant, GTM Debug Mode, Chrome DevTools, and server-side tracking setups.
  • Ability to integrate tracking systems with CRM platforms, marketing automation tools, or custom APIs is preferred but not required.
  • Basic understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and website architecture to collaborate effectively with developers and resolve tracking issues.
  • Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with other team members.
  • Google Ads and Bing Ads certifications within the last 6 to 12 months are a plus.
  • Must be located in Brazi.


Schedule :
40 hours a week


Benefits :


  • Paid time off
  • Growth opportunities
  • Work with a global team


Compensation :
Will be based on the candidate's experience, earnings in previous jobs, and the local job market.


To apply, email your resume and cover letter to :
Meryl D’Sa-Wilson, Digital Marketing Manager:

title: Senior System Engineer
description:
T-Systems, a German multinational company and part of the Deutsche Telekom Group, is seeking a Senior System Engineer DevOps with a good command of English to work 100% remotely.


You will:


  • Be part of a DevOps team working on SaaS/PaaS platforms and/or services;
  • Work with Azure, OpenAI, Terraform/OpenTofu and whatever you deem necessary to get the job done;
  • Perform and define operational tasks related to best practices for service operations in our Azure or OTC environments;
  • Automate and manage GIT pipelines and templates for the deployment and configuration of our Azure product packages;
  • Having customercontact for enabling the product packages is part of your job.



Your qualifications:


  • Strong understanding of routing and firewall strategies;
  • Strong practical knowledge of working with Azure or OTC;
  • Strong understanding of ITIL processes like incident and problem management;
  • Extensive experience in system administration (various Linux distributions);
  • Experience withscripting, automation, test procedures, certificate handling;
  • Know-how in DevOps, or interest in familiarization with Continuous Integration (CI), Continuous Delivery (CD);
  • Experienced in using GitLab, Terraform/OpenTofu, Ansible, Shell scripts and Python;
  • Willingness to familiarize yourself with sharepoint, confluence and Jira;
  • Previous experience with operational support through troubleshooting and error analysis;
  • Ensure efficient logging and monitoring (with tools like Graylog, Icinga or similar) and reliable troubleshooting.


Activities:


We are looking for an experienced Senior System Engineer (DevOps) to take ownership of the management and optimization of platforms running critical products and services in cloud environments such as Microsoft Azure or Open Telekom Cloud (OTC). In this role, you will play a key part in ensuring the reliability, scalability, and performance of our infrastructure, while working closely with the system architects to translate architectural designs into operational platforms. You will be responsible for automating, deploying, and maintaining infrastructure, while proactively monitoring systems for performance, security, and reliability. As a Senior System Engineer, your experience with cloud platforms, automation tools, and DevOps best practices will be essential to ensuring the successful and seamless operation of our services. You will also collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, providing technical guidance, resolving platform issues, and contributing to continuous improvements in our infrastructure and deployment processes.


Come be Magenta!

title: Finance Manager (Fp&A)
description:
About EDGE:

EDGE is a leading defense and technology company, delivering innovative solutions in the defense, security, and intelligence sectors. We are looking for passionate and driven individuals to join our growing team. As a key player in the LATAM region, EDGE is committed to providing cutting-edge capabilities and world-class solutions to meet our clients' evolving needs.


Experience in Defence & Military Industry is required.



Key Responsibilities:

The FP&A Manager is responsible for financial planning, forecasting, and business analysis to support strategic decision-making. This role goes beyond traditional finance functions, integrating business feasibility studies and financial simulations to drive profitability and growth.


1. Financial Planning & Analysis:

- Develop and manage financial models for forecasting, budgeting, and strategic planning.

- Analyze financial performance, identifying trends, risks, and opportunities.

- Prepare variance analysis and provide insights for corrective actions.


2. Business Feasibility & Simulations:
- Conduct feasibility studies for new projects, investments, and business expansions.

- Perform scenario analysis and financial simulations to assess business risks and ROI.

- Support decision-making with data-driven insights and financial impact assessments.


3. Strategic Business Support:

- Collaborate with business leaders to align financial plans with corporate strategy.

- Provide recommendations to optimize cost structures and revenue streams.

- Support M&A evaluations, market entry strategies, and new product launches.


4. Stakeholder Communication:

- Present financial findings and strategic recommendations to senior management.

- Act as a bridge between finance and operations to improve financial performance.

- Develop dashboards and reports for real-time decision-making.


Education:

- Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.

- Professional accounting qualification (e.G., CPA, CIMA, CA, ACCA).

- A Master’s degree is highly desirable.


Qualifications and Experience:


- 5+ years of experience in financial and management accounting within a relevant organization - Defence & Military industry is a must.

- Strong analytical and financial modeling skills.

- Expertise in business feasibility analysis and financial simulations.

- Proficiency in financial planning tools (e.G., Excel, Power BI, SAP, Anaplan).

- Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and influence decision-making.

- Fluency in both Portuguese and English is a must.

title: Senior Data Scientist
description:
Currently, we are looking for a Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer who will be a part of the general-purpose data science core team and work with tasks covering a wide variety of business needs with a soft focus on NLP or CV applications.

In this position, you will work with multiple data sources (usually textual, numerical and time-related data), huge and small datasets to develop, validate and deploy machine learning models, tune their performance & integrate them into data processing pipelines.

Responsibilities:

  • Deal with both structured and unstructured data, collaborate with data engineers on defining data storage formats, state data collection requirements;
  • Not only solve technical tasks but understand business needs and offer appropriate solutions, describe a chosen approach to non-technical people;
  • Set up reproducible experiments:
    selection, training, validation and optimization of machine learning models, evaluation of their quality in business-related terms;
  • Integrate data preprocessing and model inference into general data processing pipelines;
  • Research new tools, papers, etc. in the machine learning area.

Requirements:

  • Strong knowledge and deep understanding of
  • Сlassical machine learning (linear models, decision trees, ensembles for classification and regression tasks, clustering and dimensionality reduction)
  • Main concepts and stages of the modelling process (validation scheme, regularization, overfitting and generalization, data leaks, feature selection, etc.)
  • Experience with Python scientific, visualization and ML-related libraries (numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, etc.)
  • Experience with different clustering techniques
  • Experience with classic NLP tools and techniques (nltk, spacy, n-grams, skip-grams, TF-IDF, tokenizers, lemmatization, dependencies parsing, etc.)
  • Experience with NN frameworks, NLP-related architectures and libraries (Pytorch / Tensorflow, HuggingFace, fasttext, flair, sentence transformersWord2Vec, ElMo, RNN, CNN, Transformer, BERT, etc.)
  • Experience in tuning pre-trained models for different NLP tasks
  • Good Python programming skills
  • Good spoken and written English (at least B1)
  • Ability and desire to convert raw business requests into strictly formulated machine learning tasks
  • Ability to formulate data gathering (or data labelling) requirements
  • Minimum 2-year experience in machine learning

title: Python Ai Developer
description:
ob Title:
Python AI Developer

Location:
 Remote (open to candidates worldwide)

Type:
 Full-Time

Compensation:
 Competitive Salary

Company:
 Confidential Client (AI Talent Development Software Company)


What if your expertise in AI and Python development could help create innovative solutions that shape the future of personal and professional development? If you're ready to step into a role where your skills can directly impact our AI-driven talent development platform, this is your opportunity!


About Us:

Our confidential client is an innovative Artificial Intelligence (AI) company, focused on revolutionizing personal and professional development through advanced AI-driven coaching, simulation, and habit development technology. Utilizing their proprietary technology they empower individuals, teams, and organizations of any size, worldwide, to enhance leadership, optimize performance, and foster a culture of continuous learning. Join a pioneering team dedicated to transforming how people learn, grow, and thrive.


Role Overview

As an AI Python Developer, you will be responsible for developing and implementing AI components that drive our platform's capabilities. This role focuses on building agent architectures and Python-based backends, ensuring that innovative AI features are seamlessly integrated into our applications. You will work closely with the development team to ensure that the AI functionalities align with production-ready environments and meet user needs effectively.


About the Founder / CEO

Fueled by a relentless passion for service, the company's founder, a seasoned entrepreneur with a track record in launching and revitalizing businesses, aims to revolutionize professional coaching by making it accessible to all. With deep expertise in AI and human behavior, the founder envisions transformative solutions powered by advanced technology. Your role as an AI Python Developer will be integral to realizing this vision, as you contribute to the development of intelligent systems that empower users across the globe.


About PHYSXX:
Our Core Values

Our organization operates under the guiding principles of PHYSXX, which stands for:

  • Passion:
     A commitment to our mission of empowering individuals and teams to achieve their best.
  • Humble:
     A willingness to accept feedback and learn from experiences, demonstrating ongoing growth.
  • Hungry:
     An eagerness to continuously improve skills and contributions, pushing past limitations.
  • Smart (People Smart):
     The capacity to understand and manage our emotions and those of others.
  • X-Factor:
     Commitment to executing projects with excellence and without excuses.


SCCKEPPP Framework:
Ensuring Functional Fit

The SCCKEPPP framework ensures that we align the right talent with the right roles effectively. It includes the following components:

  • Skills:
     Core technical and soft skills required for success in the role.
  • Circumstances:
     Personal and external life circumstances that could influence work success.
  • Conditions:
     Formal prerequisites and qualities necessary for the job.
  • Knowledge:
     Required knowledge areas critical for performance in the role.
  • Experience:
     Type and depth of experience needed for the position.
  • Past Performance:
     Achievements or performance metrics indicating excellence in similar roles.
  • Potential:
     Traits indicating future growth and adaptability.


The “What” Pillar:
Ensure a Functional Match (“Be SCCKEPPP-tical”)

Skills (S) :

  • Proficient in Python programming with a strong focus on AI and machine learning frameworks (e.G., TensorFlow, PyTorch).
  • Familiarity with agent architecture design and implementation.
  • Experience building backend services and APIs to support AI-driven applications.
  • Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software engineering principles.
  • Ability to work effectively in a team-oriented, collaborative environment.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and the capacity to break down complex technical challenges.


Circumstances (C) :

  • A stable home environment conducive to remote work.
  • Eagerness to learn and grow in a fast-paced, dynamic tech environment.
  • Ability to communicate clearly with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Conditions (C) :

  • Holds a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Data Science, or a related field.
  • 2+ years of experience in Python development, with a focus on AI or machine learning.
  • Comfort working independently in a remote setting with effective time management.


Knowledge (K) :

  • Understanding of best practices in AI development and deployment.
  • Familiarity with cloud services and their integration with AI applications.
  • Awareness of software deployment and monitoring to align AI features with production-ready environments.

Experience (E) :

  • Proven experience in developing and deploying AI solutions in production environments.
  • Portfolio showcasing relevant projects and contributions in AI development.
  • Evidence of collaboration with cross-functional teams to integrate AI functionalities.

Past Performance (PP) :

  • Examples of successful AI projects developed that resulted in meaningful user engagement and business impact.
  • Feedback from team members and stakeholders highlighting your contributions to team projects.


Potential (P) :

  • Demonstrated ambition and a passion for AI technologies and their application.
  • Willingness to seek guidance from senior developers to enhance backend integration and production readiness.



Qualifications:


  • Bachelor's degree in computer science, Data Science, AI, or a related field, or equivalent experience.
  • 3+ years of experience in Python development, with a focus on AI and machine learning.
  • Proficiency in machine learning libraries and frameworks (e.G., TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch).
  • Solid understanding of algorithms, data structures, and software design principles.
  • Experience with data manipulation and analysis tools (e.G., Pandas, NumPy).
  • Familiarity with cloud computing platforms (e.G., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) is a plus.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a collaborative environment.


Preferred Skills:


  • Knowledge of Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques.
  • Experience with front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is a plus.
  • Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.
  • Understanding of data visualization techniques and tools.


Why Join Us:


  • Innovative Impact:
     Be part of a team that is shaping the future of AI-driven coaching, making a meaningful impact on personal and professional growth worldwide.
  • Career Growth:

description:

Job Summary

Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) is a discipline that incorporates aspects of software engineering and applies them to infrastructure and operations problems. The main goals are to create scalable and highly reliable software systems.

Responsibilities and Duties

  • Utilize software tools and automated tasks for continuous monitoring and reliability of applications;
  • Act swiftly in response to emergency situations impacting system reliability in production environments, performing root cause analysis for on-going incidents;
  • Oversee and streamline change management processes to enhance system performance and reliability. Ownership of releases to production environments;
  • Work closely with development teams throughout the software lifecycle, with a focus on contributing to solving system-related issues and eliminating toil - automating routine tasks for enhanced productivity;
  • Focus on the reliability and scalability of systems, ensuring high performance and efficiency standards.

Essential Skills

  • Proficiency in monitoring tools like Azure Monitoring, App Insights, Prometheus, Grafana. Project tracking and version management with tools like JIRA, SVN, GitHub;
  • Expertise withInfrastructure as Code (Terraform, ARM/Bicep, Pulumi, etc.) and release management tooling (ArgoCD, Harness, Octopus, etc.);
  • Experience in incident alert tools (PageDuty, Opsgenie), and container orchestration tools like Kubernetes, AKS and similar.

With over 9,000 experts in 47+ offices and innovation labs worldwide, Encora’s technology practices include Product Engineering & Development, Cloud Services, Quality Engineering, DevSecOps, Data & Analytics, Digital Experience, Cybersecurity, and AI & LLM Engineering.

title: Lead Data Scientist
description:
Job Title:
Lead Data Scientist

Location:
 Remote (Ability to support US Central Time Zone)

Duration:
 6-12+ months

Experience Level:
 Minimum of 5+ years of relevant experience


Job Overview:

The Lead Data Scientist will play a key role in designing, developing, and deploying advanced analytics solutions to support the client’s transformation and rapid growth. This role requires a deep understanding of statistical and machine learning methodologies to extract insights and enable business partners to make data-driven decisions.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and deploy machine learning and statistical models for predictive analytics, classification, clustering, regression, time series analysis, and other advanced analytics solutions.
  • Work closely with business partners to translate complex business problems into clear data science models and actionable insights.
  • Lead data science projects from conception to implementation, collaborating with internal and external teams.
  • Optimize and scale analytics solutions using cloud-based and distributed computing technologies.
  • Effectively communicate technical findings and insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.


Required Qualifications:

  • Expert knowledge of statistics and machine learning methods, including regression, classification, time series analysis, clustering, simulation, and dimensionality reduction.
  • Strong experience in traditional machine learning and statistics-based data science projects.
  • Proven ability to lead projects independently and collaboratively, working with cross-functional teams.
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, SQL, and R.
  • Hands-on experience with data science tools (e.G., Databricks), distributed computing, and cloud analytics (e.G., Azure).
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present complex insights to stakeholders.


If you are passionate about leveraging data science to drive business transformation and innovation, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity!

title: Ai Business Applications Associate – Brazil
description:
AI Business Applications Associate – Brazil

About Dayos


At the heart of the world’s largest and most complex enterprises are business applications —sophisticated systems that power financial operations, supply chains, human resources, and IT services . Companies like Nike, Reddit, Walmart, and Disney rely on these platforms daily to streamline processes, scale operations, and stay competitive .


While these systems are essential, they often require automation and enhancements to maximize efficiency. That’s where Dayos comes in. As a trusted partner of Oracle Cloud, Workday, SAP, and ServiceNow , we build AI-native support solutions that seamlessly integrate with these platforms. Our technology automates workflows, enhances decision-making, and optimizes enterprise efficiency across Finance, HR, Procurement, and IT Service Management (ITSM) .


With a global presence spanning the United States, Singapore, Brazil, Hungary, and Australia , Dayos is built to support customers worldwide, operating in a follow-the-sun model —just like the enterprises we serve. This ensures that businesses leveraging Dayos AI can access continuous support, real-time AI-driven insights, and seamless automation across their critical business functions, no matter where they operate.


Why Join Us?

We are launching a global initiative to train the next generation of AI-driven business technology professionals . This is an opportunity to build expertise in enterprise AI, automation, and SaaS platforms—all while getting paid to learn.

What You Will Gain:

✅ Hands-on AI Training – Work alongside AI engineers to understand how AI is transforming business applications.

✅ Industry Certifications – Earn recognized credentials in Oracle Cloud and Workday , learning how global companies manage Finance, HR, and Procurement.

✅ Real-World Experience – Support AI-driven automation and workflow solutions that integrate with major enterprise platforms.

✅ A Global Career Path – Collaborate with teams across São Paulo, Sydney, Budapest, and the U.S. , supporting customers worldwide in a 24/7 follow-the-sun model .


What You Will Do

As an AI Business Applications Associate , you will:

  • Learn & Master Enterprise SaaS Platforms – Gain expertise in ERP, HCM, and ITSM platforms , understanding how businesses run financial, HR, and operational processes.
  • Work on AI-Powered Business Solutions – Support AI automation that improves decision-making and optimizes enterprise workflows.
  • Assist in Implementations & Support – Configure, test, and optimize AI-driven business applications.
  • Develop Problem-Solving Skills – Work on cross-functional projects that impact real-world businesses, from large retailers to financial institutions.


This role is ideal for those who want to build a career in AI, automation, and enterprise technology .



Who You Are

We are looking for motivated, early-career professionals who are excited about the intersection of AI and business technology .

Minimum Qualifications:

✔ Recent graduate (0-2 years of experience) in Computer Science, Business, Information Systems, Engineering, or a related field.

✔ Strong interest in AI, automation, and enterprise technology with a desire to develop expertise in this industry.

✔ Eager to learn Oracle Cloud, Workday, and AI-driven business applications .

✔ Strong analytical and problem-solving skills .

✔ Ability to multi-task and work in a fast-paced, global environment .

✔ Comfortable working with cross-functional teams (engineering, product, and sales).

Bonus Points if You Have:

➕ Some exposure to Python, SQL, APIs, or cloud computing .

➕ Knowledge of ERP, HR, or financial systems .

➕ Relevant coursework or certifications in AI, automation, or enterprise software .

➕ Experience in data analysis and business process improvement .



What We Offer

$5,000 investment in your training – We cover the cost of industry certifications in Oracle Cloud and Workday to launch your career.

Non-Billable Training Time – The first five weeks are focused on learning, not client work.

title: Sap Data Migration Associate Consultant
description:
ABOUT US

Syniti is the enterprise data partner, empowering anyone who relies on data to make business-critical decisions by delivering data they can trust through a unique combination of intelligent software and experts who deeply understand the role of data in enterprise growth.


Trusted by the Fortune 2000, Syniti helps leading businesses reconfigure the role of enterprise data from afterthought to foundational first step;
enabling them to unlockvaluable insights that ignite growth, reduce risk, and expand their competitive advantage.


Syniti’s Data First philosophy and enterprise data management platform supports data migration, data quality, data replication, data matching, master data management, analytics, data governance, and data strategy in a single, unified solution.


As an innovative, global leader in Enterprise Data Management, the combination of our award-winning software platform and premier consultants creates a unique advantage for leading enterprises. Syniti is also a preferred data solution used by the world’s top system integrators . Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts with offices in 25 countries around the world, Syniti operates in all global regions and industry verticals, and maintains a 100% client success rate across thousands of complex data projects and initiatives.



The ROLE

We predominantly deliver data migration projects to global clients, while also working in data quality and data governance.


All our consultants use software created on our proprietary ‘DSP’ platform to perform all aspects of the data migration project lifecycle.


We are recruiting talented and motivated individuals to join our team delivering data projects for clients, and offer training, mentoring and project focused development opportunities for candidates passionate about pursuing a career in data.



WHAT YOU WILL DO

After an initial training period, a Data Migration Consultant will be expected to:


  • Demonstrate a strong understanding of our own Data Migration / Data Governance methodology
  • Demonstrate strong proficiency in our tools, working to prescribed development standards
  • Good understanding of business processes for assigned functional area
  • Demonstrate a strong knowledge of underlying technical data structures and definitions of assigned functional process area
  • Develop data migration / governance rules in our tools as per supplied specification
  • Contribute to integrated data migration design for assigned process area through data analysis, reporting and collaboration with on-site BOA and client colleagues
  • Design, create and execute reports in alignment to project deliverables
  • Create and maintain data load programs
  • Maintain related documentation
  • Execution of end-to-end data loads and reconciliations




WHAT IT TAKES

  • Degree level qualification in Computer Science (or other technology related field)
  • Experience in ETL / Data Migration / Data Quality / Data Analysis
  • Functional ERP (SAP / Infor etc.) experience
  • Project experience across ERP implementations
  • Experience with T-SQL
  • Database experience - SQL Server, Oracle etc.
  • Excellent English written and verbal communication skills
  • Proficient in MS Office


WHAT WE OFFER


Trust that you are good at what you’re doing. At Syniti you will find a supportive environment and access to learning tools, but micromanagement is not our thing.


Growth . We are growing rapidly and steadily solving the biggest challenges enterprise companies are faced with today. There was never a better time to join and grow with us. Most importantly you will have the chance to shape our journey and share in our success story.


Support . We all rely on each other and enable each other to be successful. You won’t stand alone.


Curiosity and genuine interest in you . We all have our different stories, all equally fascinating with each depicting a different journey and we want to hear them all.


Recognition . We are the sum of individual achievements and we always take the time to celebrate them.


An open organisation . Hierarchies are not our thing and access is something we make sure of across the board. We are a family where everyone is just as important, everyone’s work is seen and ideas valued.

title: Ai Software Development Engineer In Test
description:
Project Description:

Open Video project is focused on OTT platform development for one of the largest North American TV providers.

We are seeking a highly skilled AI Engineer to join our Software Quality Engineering (SQE) team. The ideal candidate will have a dual focus:
contributing to AI/ML solution development while performing responsibilities typical of a Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET). This role involves building and deploying AI-powered solutions for enhancing software testing, automation frameworks, and processes.


Responsibilities:

AI Engineering:

1. AI Solution Development:

1.1. Develop AI-powered solutions to improve software quality assurance processes.

1.2. Leverage frameworks like Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and other state-of-the-art AI/ML frameworks to design innovative testing and debugging tools.

1.3. Create models for triaging and debugging test case failures using structured and unstructured data, such as log files.

2. Framework Optimization:

2.1. Enhance testing processes with AI to automate root-cause analysis, bug detection, and recommendation systems.

2.2. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into existing software testing pipelines.

3. MLOps Development:

3.1. Design, implement, and maintain robust MLOps pipelines for continuous integration and deployment of AI/ML models.

3.2. Automate workflows for model training, evaluation, and deployment.


SDET Responsibilities:

1. Test Case Creation & Maintenance:

1.1. Write, maintain, and optimize manual and automated test cases for functional, regression, and performance testing.

1.2. Collaborate with development teams to define test strategies and acceptance criteria for new features.

2. Automation Framework Development:

2.1. Build and enhance automation frameworks for Android, Web, and backend systems using tools like Appium, Selenium, or equivalent.

2.2. Integrate automation pre-checks, post-checks, and reporting systems to ensure test case reliability.

3. Code Review & Collaboration:

3.1. Review and provide feedback on code quality and design for testability.

3.2. Work closely with software engineers and other SDETs to drive testing best practices.

4. Test Data Management:

4.1. Work with engineering teams to ensure proper test data management, including synthetic data generation for testing AI-based solutions.


Mandatory Skills Description:

AI/ML Expertise:

- Strong knowledge of machine learning frameworks (e.G., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn).

- Experience with MLOps tools (e.G., MLflow, Kubeflow, AWS Bedrock, SageMaker).

- Proficiency in RAG frameworks and understanding of knowledge-based systems.

- Familiarity with LangChain and Hugging Face Transformers. Experience working with Streamlit.

- Strong command on all AWS services and prompt engineering techniques and Dspy.

SDET Expertise:

- Proficiency in test automation tools (e.G., Appium, Selenium, JUnit, TestNG).

- Strong programming skills in languages like Python, Java.

- Experience with CI/CD tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, or equivalent.

General Skills:

- Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.G., AWS, GCP, Azure).

- Knowledge of SQL and database management for test data validation.

- Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills in software systems.


Languages:

English:
B2 Upper Intermediate

title: Marketing Coordinator
description:
Hey, Dingus!


Yeah, you heard that right.

Dingus & Zazzy is looking for a motivated, ambitious Marketing Coordinator to join our growing team!


About Us:

Dingus & Zazzy is a comprehensive digital marketing agency offering services for brands looking to expand their presence across a variety of digital platforms. Our business is expanding globally, and we need talented folks on our team to continue offering stellar service to our clients.

Running a company is a little like building a plane while flying it. There’s always too much to do;
doing one thing means neglecting something else. You have to blog but also be active on social media. You have to build websites and then optimize them for mobile. Email lists. Emails. Keywords. SEM. SEO. UX. UI. FML. OMG. That’s where we come in. We provide an unlimited get-shit-done subscription for our clients. And we need your help!



About You:

  • Highly motivated and passionate about a job well done
  • Proactive;
    you’re always looking afew steps ahead to anticipate problems and find solutions
  • Friendly, respectful, and good at working within a team
  • Excellent time management
  • Excellent communication
  • Resourceful;
    if there’s something you don’t know, you don’t let that bog you down―you know how to find answers and get it done
  • You love talking to people all day and coming up with ideas to solve problems
  • You’re organized! Dear Lord, please!
  • You genuinely care about clients and their success. We aren’t a factory
  • You like the smell after it rains on a hot summer day
  • Background in marketing is a must
  • Attention to detail is crucial
  • Nerdiness is a huge plus―we’re a team of DND nerds, video game aficionados, Pokémon lovers and bookworms…ready to join?


Job Summary:


The Marketing Coordinator will play a vital role in developing and implementing effective communication strategies to promote our clients’ brand, products, and services. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in technology or communications and have a passion for creating engaging content. The Marketing Coordinator will collaborate with cross-functional teams to execute marketing initiatives and drive brand awareness for their clients.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Technology, Communications, Marketing, or a related field
  • Solid understanding of communication principles, branding, and marketing concepts
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to create compelling content and tailor messaging for different audiences
  • Proficiency in utilizing various communication channels and tools, including social media platforms, content management systems, email marketing platforms, and analytics tools
  • Strong organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines
  • Experience in managing websites, including content updates and basic knowledge of SEO practices
  • Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and establish positive working relationships with internal and external stakeholders


Our operating hours are from 9 A.M. to 5 P.M. MST, Monday to Friday.

Ready for the ride of your life?


Apply now—let’s get talking, get making, and go get that bacon.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
Lessons.Com is a platform that connects students with the best local instructors for lessons in everything from music and sports to academics and hobbies. We’re passionate about empowering learners and helping instructors grow their businesses. Join our dynamic team to shape the future of personalized learning experiences.


Role Overview

We are a small but powerful team that’s improving millions of people’s lives. We are looking for a talented Full Stack Engineer to join our team. In this role, you will build scalable, user-friendly applications that deliver an exceptional experience for both students and instructors. You will work closely with designers, product managers, and other developers to enhance our platform and bring new features to life.


Why Work for Lessons?
  • 100% remote.
  • Excellent compensation in US Dollars.
  • Work with global teams and prominent brands.
  • Endless opportunities for personal growth.
  • Vast engineering challenges and responsibilities.
  • Building features that are used by millions of people.
  • Ability to make a huge impact quickly and excel professionally.


Responsibilities
  • Design and develop scalable and responsive full-stack applications.
  • Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code for both front-end and back-end components.
  • Integrate applications with databases and third-party APIs.
  • Participate in the planning and execution of development projects.
  • Stay updated on emerging technologies, frameworks, and best practices.


Qualifications
  • 5+ years experience as a Full Stack Developer.
  • Fluent English .
  • Strong understanding of front-end and back-end development principles.
  • Proficiency in front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and modern frameworks/libraries.
  • Experience with server-side languages (e.G., Node.Js, Python, Java, C#).
  • Knowledge of database systems.
  • Self-directed and capable of working effectively in a highly innovative and fast-paced environment.


Preferred Skills
  • Node.Js
  • React
  • MongoDB
  • GraphQL
  • AWS
  • Server-side Rendering

title: Renewable Energy / Energy Efficiency Experts - Eib Framework Contract Eibas Lot 2
description:
NTU International A/S, leading a strong international consortium, is proud to have been awarded the next 4 years of EIBAS FWC LOT 2!


We are building up a pool of experts who will be interested in short term assignments on the various EIB priorities under this framework contract.


Keep updated and follow us at />// for more information on our projects.


Position :
Energy Specialist

Location :
Inside and outside EU-27

Assignment duration :
48 months

Project budge t:
20M EUR



Qualifications and skills:

  • At least 10 years professional experience in the field of:
    energy supply, renewable energy, energy infrastructure, energy efficiency, energy innovation, etc.
  • Experience working with EU, EIB, WB etc. financed projects.
  • A Master’s Degree or Bachelor's Degree relevant to the topic


Specific professional experience within at least one of the following sectors:

Energy Supply:

· Power generation and cogeneration:
low-carbon power and CHP plants, carbon capture use and storage, renewable energy (hydro, wind energy, ocean, solar, geothermal, biomass, biogas, and waste to energy).

· Heat production from renewable sources;

· Efficient gas-fired small boilers applicable for buildings or SMEs;

· Production and storage of gaseous, liquid and solid energy carriers from low-carbon energy sources;

· Supply and processing of Critical Raw Material needed for key low-carbon technologies and/or energy transition in the EU.


Enabling Infrastructure:

· Electricity transmission and distribution infrastructure, including storage.

· Gas infrastructure:

1. connection to new sources of low carbon gases,

2. gas network projects that are planned to transport low carbon gases, including the rehabilitation and adaptation of existing gas infrastructures when it is part of this goal,

3. smart meters intended to reduce gas consumption.

· District heating and cooling infrastructure, including storage.

· Smart energy grids and smart meters


Energy Efficiency:

· Energy efficiency in buildings (residential and non-residential sectors);

· Energy efficiency in public lighting.

· Energy efficiency and low-carbon technologies and processes in industrial facilities and SMEs;


Energy intensive industries and corresponding processes:

· Carbon emission reduction technologies for iron and steel, refining, chemicals, cement, glass, paper refining and other industries


Innovation:
energy intensive industries and new types of energy infrastructure:

· Corporate or national RDI programmes;

· Commercial demonstration of innovative technologies, including demonstration projects, innovative manufacturing processes, and innovative low-carbon technologies in energy-intensive industries;

· Technologies and business models that contribute to the implementation of the EU Strategic Energy Technology plan or decarbonisation of EII, including renewables, carbon capture use and storage, cross sectoral projects, sector coupling, circular economy pathways, electrification, biomass as feedstock, innovative energy carriers, nuclear fission and fusion;

· New types of energy infrastructure including batteries and innovative energy storage technologies, demand response, market participants engaged in aggregation, electrification of transport, heating, digitalisation projects in energy sector;
all projects that contribute towards sector coupling and increased flexibility of energy systems.


Language skills:

· Excellent command of English (CEFR C1) (Minimum requirement)


If you are interested in this position, please apply and upload your CV. Please also make sure that you include one or more telephone numbers.


The work location is Remote.


Please note that only selected candidates will be contacted.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Who WE are

Bearaby is an award-winning Direct to Consumer (DTC) company on a mission to bring comfort and relief to people of all ages who are searching for calm in a complex world. We create beautiful and functional products, including our flagship weighted blankets, that are sustainably manufactured from organic materials and innovative upcycled fabrics - loom to lap. We believe that restorative rest should be simple, natural, and drug-free - and that it's time to ditch the negative stigmas around healthy habits like napping and sleeping-in for a calmer, more collected world.


Role Summary

Bearaby is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Graphic Designer to support our creative and digital teams with stunning digital visuals for a range of digital mediums, such as website, email, paid ads, and social media. In this role, you will play a pivotal role in designing user-centric interfaces and creating engaging visual experiences that are optimized for conversions, in a way that adheres to our brand identity. An ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio showcasing a deep understanding of both graphic design principles and paid marketing strategies, with a proven track record of designing successful marketing campaigns for ecommerce.


Duties and Responsibilities

  • Ads creation:
    support our paid media team by creating marketing campaigns that includes images, videos and stitching user-generated content with overlay text and other compelling visuals.
  • UI/UX Design:
    develop and implement visually appealing user interfaces for our website that are optimized independently for mobile and desktop, ensuring designs are user-friendly, responsive and aligned with best practices for UX/UI.
  • Email design:
    use Figma, Canva or other design platforms to create marketing emails that are visually compelling, effectively communicated and follow the brand guidelines.
  • Wireframing & Prototyping:
    Create detailed wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes to communicate design concepts and user flows effectively.
  • Collaboration:
    Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, marketers, and product development, to ensure designs are executed accurately and meet project objectives and timelines.
  • Innovation:
    Stay up-to-date with industry trends, design tools, and best practices. Bring fresh ideas and innovative solutions to enhance our eCommerce platform.
  • Brand Partnerships:
    Support brand partnerships by creating product mock-ups for a range of different products, in a manner that is both innovative and true to the brand.


Who You Are

  • Strong creative with an eye for great design that suits the brand style and addresses functional concerns.
  • Knowledgeable and skilled in building ads, landing pages, adapting typography and design to the brand’s UI/UX guidelines, photography, and retouching images.
  • A flexible thinker who is comfortable taking on feedback and can work with strategic direction
  • A team player with the ability to work closely across teams in a fast-paced startup environment
  • A proactive self-starter with top notch written and verbal communication skills
  • A strong communicator with excellent interpersonal skills at all levels, which include both written and verbal communication skills.
  • Exceptionally detailed, with the ability to create pixel-perfect designs and ensure high-quality outcomes.
  • Comfortable with working in G Suite, monday.Com, and Slack
  • Adaptable, flexible and resilient, with excellent interpersonal, communication and negotiation skills.


Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in a related field, preferably a BFA with 2-3 years of graphic design experience, with a strong focus on digital marketing ads and email design.
  • Experience working with design tools such as inDesign, Photoshop, Figma, Illustrator, and/or other related software. Strong understanding of HTML/CSS is a plus.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
  • Experience working with a digitally native brand or branding/digital marketing agency
  • Strong problem-solving skills with a creative and analytical approach to design challenges.
  • Experience working for an international company in a cross-cultural context.
  • A passion for sustainable wellness and restorative rest is a bonus!


We Offer

  • Competitive salary
  • Paid annual leave
  • Birthday off
  • Unlimited Naps
  • Supportive colleagues and a high performing team
  • Access to training, resources and network

title: Sap Mdg Senior Consultant
description:
About Us

Syniti is the enterprise data partner, empowering anyone who relies on data to make business-critical decisions by delivering data they can trust through a unique combination of intelligent software and experts who deeply understand the role of data in enterprise growth.

Trusted by the Fortune 2000, Syniti helps leading businesses reconfigure the role of enterprise data from afterthought to foundational first step;
enabling them to unlockvaluable insights that ignite growth, reduce risk, and expand their competitive advantage.


Syniti’s Data First philosophy and enterprise data management platform supports data migration, data quality, data replication, data matching, master data management, analytics, data governance, and data strategy in a single, unified solution.


As an innovative, global leader in Enterprise Data Management, the combination of our award-winning software platform and premier consultants creates a unique advantage for leading enterprises. Syniti is also a preferred data solution used by the world’s top system integrators. Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts with offices in 25 countries around the world, Syniti operates in all global regions and industry verticals, and maintains a 100% client success rate across thousands of complex data projects and initiatives.



THE ROLE

Master Data Governance consultant, responsible for functional and technical support/maintenance of master data objects in SAP MDG, ECC, S4H, FIORI.


What You Will Do

Planning and execution of activities related to the implementation of the SAP-MDG solution.

Key Responsibilities :

  • Evaluation of the current information management of Architecture-Data (AS IS) and future model profiling (TO BE).
  • SAP MDG Implementation:
    management of design and implementation phases( technical and functional ).
  • Design and execution master data configurations for main catalogs governed by MDG:
    clients – vendors (BP figure), products, materials and finances, including data harmonization that involves de-duplication and massive changes.
  • Generation of technical requirements to ensure that the technological environment allows the replication of data in different instances-related modules.
  • Generate SAP product and solution roadmaps around the defined data strategy.
  • Communicate effectively with clients and stakeholders to understand specific business data needs and to translate those requirements into a comprehensive solution.
  • Workplan follow-up and progress reports.



What It Takes

  • +3 years’ experience MDG implementation projects:
    initial, roll out and upgrades
  • +5 year experience in SAP technologies related
  • Understanding the SAP MDG technical framework:
    BADI, BAPI / RFC / FM, workflows, BRF +, business services, IDOC, Floorplan Manager, WebDynPro, Fiori y API de MDG.
  • Conducted previous SAP MDG Implementations, technical and functional phases.
  • Knowledge of SAP data dictionary tables, views, relationships and correspondence of data architecture for ECC and S4HANA for various SAP master and transactional data entities, including a great depth of functional and knowledge of central master data objects such as customers, vendors, materials and finance specific data.
  • Ability to transform business and operational needs into technical solutions.
  • Extensive knowledge of SAP best practices and ASAP methodology (SAP certifications a plus
  • Effective communication and development of work teams, as well as relationship with client teams related to the project.
  • Goal Oriented
  • Fluent English (Advance-Native Level, oral-written)


Be fully aligned to the our core values:

  • Think Big - Be courageous and bold. Aspire to greatness. Relentlessly pursue market innovation. Set the standard by which others follow. Create solutions that have a meaningful impact. Solve the challenges our customers don’t know they have.
  • Be Curious - Be a lifelong learner. Seek out new ideas to serve customers. Understand our competition and the world. Be permanently dissatisfied with the status quo. Challenge preconceptions. Focus on the future rather than yesterday.
  • Take Action - Be the first. Don’t wait. Take accountability. Inspire others by doing. Fail fast and learn from mistakes. Make a difference every day.
  • Stronger Together - Respect, trust and look out for each other. Celebrate diverse perspectives. Listen. Build connections and belonging. Act with integrity. Give back. One Syniti family.



What We Offer

  • Trust that you are good at what you’re doing. At Syniti you will find a supportive environment and access to learning tools, but micromanagement is not our thing.
  • Growth. We are growing rapidly and steadily solving the biggest challenges enterprise companies are faced with today. There was never a better time to join and grow with us. Most importantly you will have the chance to shape our journey and share in our success story.
  • Support. We all rely on each other and enable each other to be successful. You won’t stand alone.
  • Curiosity and genuine interest in you. We all have our different stories, all equally fascinating with each depicting a different journey and we want to hear them all.
  • Recognition. We are the sum of individual achievements and we always take the time to celebrate them.
  • An open organisation. Hierarchies are not our thing and access is something we make sure of across the board. We are a family where everyone is just as important, everyone’s work is seen and ideas valued.

title: Senior Financial Business Partne
description:
We are seeking an experienced and results-driven Senior Financial Business Partner with a background in the IT services industry or other professional services industries to join our finance team. This role will act as a true partner to dedicated functions within the business, focusing on delivering critical financial insights and analysis to support business decision-making. Emphasis will be on budget vs. actual variance analysis, financial support, pricing and deal review, annual budgeting, and mid-year forecasting. The ideal candidate is a strategic thinker with exceptional analytical skills and the ability to communicate complex financial information effectively to various stakeholders.


Key Responsibilities

1. Budget vs. Actual Variance Analysis:

  • Monitor and analyze monthly financial performance against budgets and forecasts.
  • Identify and explain key variances, trends, and financial risks.
  • Work with business leaders to create action plans to ensure financial targets are met.
  • Work proactively to ensure future plans are achievable while reviewing historical performance.

2. Financial Support:

  • Partner with Business Unit and Department leaders to provide financial insights and guidance.
  • Assist in evaluating revenue growth opportunities and cost optimization strategies
  • Review Realization and Utilization reports to optimize gross margin on client engagements
  • Prepare financial reports and dashboards tailored to specific revenue centers.

3. Pricing and Deal Review:

  • Collaborate with sales and business development teams to review and validate pricing structures.
  • Conduct profitability and margin analysis on new and existing deals.
  • Ensure compliance with internal policies and external regulations during deal structuring.

4. Annual Budgeting:

  • Lead the preparation and consolidation of annual budgets, ensuring alignment with strategic goals.
  • Work with department heads to create detailed financial plans.
  • Present budget insights and recommendations to executive leadership.


5. Mid-Year Forecasting:

  • Develop and update mid-year forecasts based on current performance trends and business changes.
  • Provide variance analysis and assess the impact of forecast adjustments on long-term plans.
  • Support scenario modeling and sensitivity analysis for key financial decisions.


Qualifications and Skills

Required:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field. MBA or CPA is a plus.
  • Experience on financial analysis.
  • Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel and experience with financial modeling.
  • Hands-on experience with ERP systems (e.G., SAP, Oracle, Netsuite) and financial planning tools (e.G., Hyperion, Adaptive Insights, NetSuite Planning & Budgeting).
  • Strong English language speaking ability.

Preferred:

  • Proven track record of supporting revenue-generating functions and performing deal analysis.
  • Ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams and influence stakeholders at various levels.
  • Effective verbal and written communication skills, including the ability to present to senior leadership.
  • Detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple projects and meet tight deadlines.


Why Join Us?

  • Opportunity to work in a fast-paced and innovative IT services environment.
  • Be a key player in shaping strategic financial decisions.
  • Collaborative company culture focused on growth, innovation, and inclusivity.

title: Machine Learning Engineer | Sponsor Us H1b
description:
Project Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled and versatile Machine Learning and Data Engineer to join our team. This role involves developing sophisticated image-based solutions for plant phenotyping and pulling, stitching, and wrangling data from various sources for advanced analytics. The successful candidate will work on a cross-functional team, collaborating closely with crop scientists, plant pathologists, cloud engineers, and data scientists to enable access to relevant data and deploy machine-learning models and solutions.


Responsibilities:

  • Develop and implement image-based solutions for quantifying various traits and features of plants.
  • Pull data from first and third-party sources, prepare it for analysis by filtering, tagging, joining, parsing, and normalizing datasets.
  • Collaborate with team members to research data sources, design and deploy data loaders, and ensure the availability of data for analytical activities.
  • Provide technical expertise in the design and implementation of data management and architecture solutions.
  • Develop, evolve, and implement concepts of data ops in partnership with cloud and ML engineers.
  • Architect, develop, deliver, and support ML products and solutions, ensuring successful deployment into production.
  • Automate model training, testing, and deployment processes.
  • Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines and ETL processes.


Requirements:

  • Master’s degree or higher in Data Science, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Robotics, Physics, Mathematics, or related fields.
  • Deep understanding and experience with Image Theory, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Python Programming, TensorFlow, or PyTorch.
  • Strong experience in designing and implementing large-scale data processing, analysis, and exploration solutions.
  • Proficiency in R, Python, advanced SQL skills, and a good understanding of data management principles.
  • Experience with cloud technologies (Azure or GCP preferred) and deploying CI/CD pipelines.
  • Knowledge of Git, PySpark, Data Bricks, and database management (SQL/PLSQL/Snowflake preferred).
  • Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently and collaborate across teams.
  • 2+ years of industry or academia experience in image processing, computer vision, or related fields.


Work Details:

  • Location:
    Remote, candidates must work in the PST time zone.
  • Work Hours:
    40 hours per week.
  • We sponsor US work visa after 1 year of service

title: Presenter
description:
Come to our huge studios in Bucharest and join over 3000+ people like you who have chosen a more exciting start or upgrade to their career, gaining great experience in a booming industry!


This role is available only for Portuguese speaker able to relocate to Romania, Europe.


Salary:

- 2000 EUR gross the first 3 month

- after the 3rd month you receive a 25% increase, which gets you close to 2600 EU gross

- after the 9th month you receive another 15% increase, which gets you to around 3000 EU gross.

+ BONUSES.


  • VISA provide
  • Relocation provided and covered
  • Accommodation provided for the first year + utilities bills.
  • No experience needed, you'll attend 2 weeks paid training.


Role Description:

We are seeking a dynamic and energetic colleague to join our team as a game presenter. In this role, you will host and present live games to our online customers, entertaining thousands of players. You will be given full training and when online will explain the rules of the game respecting and maintaining the game standards provided by the Company. During the game, you’ll regularly be reminding the players of the rules in a polite manner which includes what they are and what they are not allowed to do.


Responsibilities:

- To be “the face” of the company delivering expert knowledge and superior gaming quality for both standard games presenting and gameshow hosting.

- Develop a knowledge and mastery of the game’s rules, skills in game handling and means of play.

- Offer entertainment and interaction with the players.

- Present and lead online streaming games to engage and entertain players.

- Present all games in the required professional manner, always showcasing exceptional presenting skills in line with the company performance expectations.

- Inform players about the rules of the games and shows and provide guidance as needed.


Candidate Requirements:

- Fluency in Portuguese is a must.

- Intermediate in English.

- Good presenting, entertainment and Engagement skills.

- An enthusiastic and positive attitude with an outgoing personality.

- Must be able to maintain high energy levels for the duration of games and shows that require a more animated performance.

- Flexibility of working hours and the ability to commit to a 24/7 service pattern.

- Must be reliable and have good attendance and timekeeping records.


If you're interested, feel free to apply here or send me your CV at

title: Quality Assurance Engineer (Food Delivery Platform)
description:
We are looking for a Test Engineer at either the Middle or Senior level to join one of our teams and help us build great products for our clients.


Customer

Our Customer offers a novel approach to office meals. Using their platform, clients receive automated and organized lunches, comprising individual and customizable meals to offices from restaurants. They deliver asymmetric advantages to their clients through vast domain expertise, simplicity, and a high level of service.

The Customer is extremely receptive to the professional opinions of the team, so you will have an opportunity to initiate changes and improve the existing solution.


Requirements

  • 3+ years of experience testing large and complex web and mobile applications
  • Experience in API testing (GraphQL)
  • Advanced knowledge of testing techniques and methodologies
  • Strong experience in test planning and estimation
  • Proven knowledge of databases and SQL (complex joins)
  • Experience in automated testing
  • Experience with version control systems (Git)
  • Upper-Intermediate level of spoken and written English
  • Ability to work extended hours once a week

Personal Profile

  • Strong analytical skills to troubleshoot issues with different teams, identify root cause, and find effective solutions
  • Attention to detail (from data to pixels)
  • Proactive approach to continuously improve and optimize your work and processes


Responsibilities

  • Perform manual testing of web and mobile UI, APIs, and data
  • Write and maintain test documentation
  • Help the automation engineer to support and expand coverage by automated tests (using Playwright and GitHub)
  • Participate in grooming sessions and work on specifications with the Product Manager
